reg_pit.title: Administrative Penalties (Integrated Pest Management Act) Regulation

change.changenote: Section 3 (3) (a) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: must conduct a written, electronic or oral hearing, or any combination of them, as the administrator, in his or her sole discretion, considers appropriate, and

change.changenote: Section 3 (5) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 76/2022, effective March 30, 2022.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: If, after giving an opportunity to make representations, the administrator does not make a determination in respect of an alleged contravention or failure by a person, the administrator must give notice to the person that he or she is not required to pay an administrative penalty.

change.changenote: Section 11 (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 164/2020, effective June 29, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 7 (6), 11 (3), 17 (4), 19 (3) or 21 of the Act is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $10 000.

change.changenote: Section 12 (1) and (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 164/2020, effective June 29, 2020.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 70 or 72 (1) (a) of the Integrated Pest Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $40 000.

A person who contravenes section 31, 34 (1), 35, 36, 37, 38, 39 (1), 40, 41 (1),(2), (5) or (6), 42 (1), (2), (5) or (6), 48 (b), 49 (1) (c), 54 (d), 57 (1) (d), 59 (2), 65 (1), 66, 72 (1) (c), 75 (2) or 83 (1) or (2) (b) of the Integrated Pest Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $10 000.

change.changenote: Section 12 (1) and (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 188/2023, effective July 17, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: A person who contravenes section 59.1, 59.2 (1), 59.3, 70 or 72 (1) (a) of the Integrated Pest Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $40 000.

A person who contravenes section 31, 34 (1), 35, 36, 37, 38, 39 (1), 40, 41 (1), (2), (5) or (6), 42 (1), (2), (5) or (6), 48 (b), 49 (1) (c), 54 (d), 57 (1) (d), 59 (2), 59.2 (2), 65 (1), 66, 72 (1) (c), 75 (2) or 83 (1) or (2) (b) of the Integrated Pest Management Regulation is liable to an administrative penalty not exceeding $10 000.
